name: Humanity's Last Hope
description:
A hive mind has found earth and sent SWARMS of aliens to destroy everything. You are the only one standing in their way... how long will humanity last?

Taking inspiration from the N64 era space shooters, this score-attack game has you flying through space taking on unending waves of alien attackers. Take aim with your ship's dual laser cannons or smash through their delicate carapaces with your cold metal shell to earn the highest score!

Local leaderboard keeps track of your greatest runs, so you can brag to your friends (Note: known bug with certain screen sizes causing scores to be invisible. Issue is fixed, but waiting on end of Jam).

Controls: WASD or Arrow keys for turning your ship. Spacebar to shoot (hold it down or spam like mad :P). Note: current version, controller/joystick don't work properly :(

Axis inversion can be changed in the controls menu.

p.s. ran out of time so no music :'(
